description: This Dart source file defines the application's theme and color scheme for a Flutter app, including color constants, theme configuration, and styling for various UI components.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: A class containing static constants defining the color palette used throughout the app.

methods.name: buildAppTheme
methods.description: A function that constructs and returns a customized ThemeData object for the app, setting colors, text styles, and component themes.
